topics.body:
So I just finished my usual Jump manga.
Bleach: [spoiler]It turns out Giselle Gewelle has taken control of Hitsugaya's body. For those who don't know, Giselle's ability is "The Zombie" The ability to control corpses. Zombie Hitsugaya has taken both Ikkaku and Yumichika out of play but he still has to take on Mayuri.[/spoiler]

Naruto: It remains a chore to read. [spoiler]Obito came back to life for a bit. Because bullshit magic eye powers. He gave his right eye to Kakashi and now ol' Kaka can use Tsukuyomi as well as Amaterasu and Susano-o. Because magic emo eyeballs.[/spoiler] [spoiler]Naruto has gotten really fucking stupid.[/spoiler]

One Piece: [spoiler]We got some backstory involving Violet's mom but nothing really happened. At this point it's just a countdown until Mingo gets punched in the face.[/spoiler]

Toriko: [spoiler]So the AIR fruit isn't ripe yet but Komatsu and the others have a plan to decrease ripening time. Meanwhile Toriko continues his fight with Horse God Heracles. But in a shocking twist, like the Battle Wolf a few hundred chapters ago Heracles is not only female but PREGNANT. She then proceeds to attempt killing Toriko........by taking a small breath.[/spoiler]
